It is always interesting to see "open minded" progressives try to intimidate free thinking people from investigating things for themselves, thinking about it, and coming to their own conclusions.

Open minded thinking is allowing anyone to think freely for themselves, not trying to shove your anti religious dogma down people's throats (minds, actually).

On the other hand, people that embrace allowing people to think for themselves will always have my respect, regardless of what their views happen to be.

The Bible was written by man hundreds of years after Jesus died and was influenced by politics and the need to spread morals and cleanliness.  Why would anyone dedicate their life to such obvious bologna and believe their opinions to be higher than those of other faiths?  "Christians" hold an extremely wide variety of beliefs and interpret the Bible in many, many ways.  Anyone that claims to know the truth is simply a liar, and if they believe they are right, then they are just ignorant.
